attachments.name: Step Passed: Valid vaccination record is created with Patient 'SFlag' and vaccine_type 'BCG'
Step Passed: Send a search request with POST method for Immunization event created
Step Passed: The request will be successful with the status code '200'
Step Passed: The Search Response JSONs should contain the detail of the immunization events created above
Step Passed: The Search Response JSONs field values should match with the input JSONs field values for resourceType Immunization
Step Passed: The Search Response JSONs field values should match with the input JSONs field values for resourceType Patient
